data.actual_result: You're taken back to the selection screen
data.expected_result: The Server Region modal should close and you remain on the Server Creation screen
data.short_description: Opening the Server Region modal in the Server Creation modal takes you back to the selection screen after it closes
data.steps_to_repro: - Press ctrl + shift + n and choose Create a server - Click on the Change button for the Server Region - Select a region and observe
